name: snowman amigurumi
notes:
crochet this cute snowman with the diy fluffies free amigurumi pattern. the small and big snowman are both made with the same pattern, using different yarn. 

the small snowman,  made from sport weight cotton yarn, has a great christmas ornament size. the big snowman was made with super bulky chenille yarn and is a very huggable plushie.

this cute pattern comes with a full free video tutorial, great for beginners!

link to pattern:
https://www.mariskavos.nl/free-snowman-crochet-pattern/

link to video:
https://youtu.be/lljmkolauc0
